meanings.sent1: The color of the sky is debatable among scientists.
meanings.sent2: The decision to go to the park is debatable for the family.
meanings.sent3: It's debatable whether cats or dogs make better pets.
meanings.sent4: The importance of kindness is debatable in today's society.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the new ice cream flavor was debatable among friends.

meanings.definition: Capable of being disputed or questioned
meanings.sent1: The price of the antique vase was debatable at the auction.
meanings.sent2: The accuracy of the data is debatable in the research paper.
meanings.sent3: It's debatable if aliens have visited Earth.
meanings.sent4: The existence of ghosts is debatable among different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the game was debatable due to a controversial call.
